Судя по скриншоту, не работает HTTPS фильтрация. Попробуйте переустановить сертификат в настройках программы, затем обновите фильтры, очистите данные браузера, перезапустите его.
Если не получится самому переустановить сертификат, свяжитесь с support@adguard.com.

pull_request.title: nicovideo.jp track parameter
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

N/A

### Add your comment and screenshots

**Changes due to this pull request** 

1. Add tracking parameters after site renewal.

2. Add the missing tracking parameters for sp.nicovideo.jp.

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by this rule:
```adblock
##div[class*=social][class*=sharing]:not([class*=body i],[id*=body i],[class*=content i],[id*=content i])
```
from `Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List`.
As a temporary solution please add:
```adblock
linkedin.com#@#div[class*=social][class*=sharing]:not([class*=body i],[id*=body i],[class*=content i],[id*=content i])
```
to user rules.

@DandelionSprout Could you please take a look?

comment.body:
> Хотя подождал несколько секунд после добавления правила

Скорее всего в этом дело. В iOS после добавления правила, обновления их или другого изменения нужно не закрывать окно ~ 1-2 минуты, иначе не применится. К сожалению, это из-за ограничений самой iOS, а точнее Apple.

comment.body:
> Also please don't remove the `||api.personaclick.com/push` filter, it blocks notification on a few sites I know of.

It is used to send data for analytics.

Added
```
! TPF
@@||googletagmanager.com/gtm.js$domain=turkcell.com.tr
||api.personaclick.com/push$xmlhttprequest
! popups filter
@@||turkcell.api.useinsider.com/ins.js$domain=turkcell.com.tr
@@||turkcell.api.useinsider.com/worker-new.html$domain=turkcell.com.tr
```

pull_request.title: nicovideo.jp track parameter
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

N/A

### Add your comment and screenshots

**Changes due to this pull request** 

1. Add tracking parameters after site renewal.

2. Add the missing tracking parameters for sp.nicovideo.jp.

the First:

transition_type,transition_id,rp,rf,ra,rd
Reproduction procedures:
1. Access `https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm37943946` 
2. Mouse over the blue band with ▶.
3. Get the following link.
`https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm43160347?playlist=eyJ0eXBlIjoic2VyaWVzIiwiY29udGV4dCI6eyJzZXJpZXNJZCI6MTg1NzIxfX0&transition_type=series&transition_id=185721&rf=nvpc&rp=watch&ra=series&rd=first`

track
domain changed. seiga.nicovideo.jp -> manga.nicovideo.jp.

the Second:

cnt_transit
Reproduction procedures:
1. Access `https://x.com/ducedayo/status/1820440208590225870`
2. Get the following link.
`https://sp.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm30916712?ss_id=8dd66c51-163b-4b9a-b867-459fd92bebbe&ss_pos=9&cp_in=wt_srch&cnt_transit=suggest`

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: mlbpark.donga.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

Related to https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/183432

I use Adguard public DNS set in my devices settings. I don't use the private DNS.

I am wondering if this scam IP (`185.149.120.173)` and other malicious IP's can be blocked in Adguard DNS so websites from this IP cannot be accessible on device where Adguard DNS is installed.

Users who use only Adguard browser extension are still at risk because it does not support `$network` modifier and DNS level blocking seems a good choice.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

latest

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

multiple sites

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Related to https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/183432

I use Adguard public DNS set in my devices settings. I don't use the private DNS.

I am wondering if this scam IP (`185.149.120.173)` and other malicious IP's can be blocked in Adguard DNS so websites from this IP cannot be accessible on device where Adguard DNS is installed.

Users who use only Adguard browser extension are still at risk because it does not support `$network` modifier and DNS level blocking seems a good choice.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This rule did not make it into the DNS filter. We'll look into it.
Antiphishing does not support block sites by IP.

pull_request.title: nicovideo.jp track parameter
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [x] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

N/A

### Add your comment and screenshots

**Changes due to this pull request** 

1. Add tracking parameters after site renewal.

2. Add the missing tracking parameters for sp.nicovideo.jp.

the First:

transition_type,transition_id,rp,rf,ra,rd
Reproduction procedures:
1. Access `https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm37943946` 
2. Mouse over the blue band with ▶.
3. Get the following link.
`https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm43160347?playlist=eyJ0eXBlIjoic2VyaWVzIiwiY29udGV4dCI6eyJzZXJpZXNJZCI6MTg1NzIxfX0&transition_type=series&transition_id=185721&rf=nvpc&rp=watch&ra=series&rd=first`

track
domain changed. seiga.nicovideo.jp -> manga.nicovideo.jp.

the Second:

cnt_transit
Reproduction procedures:
1. Access `https://x.com/ducedayo/status/1820440208590225870`
2. Get the following link.
`https://sp.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm30916712?ss_id=8dd66c51-163b-4b9a-b867-459fd92bebbe&ss_pos=9&cp_in=wt_srch&cnt_transit=suggest`

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

According to official sources, there're no such foundations and organisations. They're fake, instead of giving scholarships to students, they defraud them and ask for identity information and IBAN:
```
bilsevvakfi.org
ogrencilerbirligi.com
```
People are asked for credentials and all people believe this method. Some people are also being asked to send money from their papara account. Some websites even ask people for an address and IBAN (rarely):
```
lcwpaketleme.com
herkeseuygunisilanlari.com
cagrievi.com
kariyerfirsatin.com.tr
cartepak.online
aryapaketleme.com
```

### Proposed solution

Can you please block these websites?

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body: The websites do look suspiciuos. I've added them to our base. Update should be available today.

> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790
